text: The 2015 Bangladesh Federation Cup is the 27th edition to be played. It was played between 16 February and 5 March 2015 (originally to start on 19 December 2014).Federation Cup 2015, RSSSF.com 11 teams from the Bangladesh Premier League along with one invited team will take part in the season's curtain-raiser.Federation Cup from Dec 19 ==Draw== The draw cremony of the tournament were held at BFF house Motijheel, Dhaka on 12 February 2015.The twelve participants were divided into four groups. Top two teams from each group will enter the quarter-finals. \---- ==Venue== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width="25%" | Dhaka |- | Bangabandhu National Stadium |- | Capacity: 36,000 |- | 200px |} \---- ==Group stages== *All matches were played at Dhaka *Times Listed are UTC+6:00. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=2|Key to colours in group tables |- |bgcolor=#cffcc style="width: 20px;"| |align=left|Group Winners and Runners advance to the Quarter-finals |} ==Group A== \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Group B== \---- \---- \---- ==Group C== \---- \---- \---- ==Group D== \---- \---- \---- ==Quarter-finals== \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Semi-finals== \---- \---- ==Final== \---- ==References== 2015 Category:2015 in Bangladeshi football Bangladesh
title: 2015 Bangladesh Federation Cup
